name: MONSTER_UPGRADE_TRUE_HALFLIFE
info: Enables real half life upgrade factor.  If true then minimum ugrade time can be randomly selected as zero.  If false then minimum ugrade time is always at least half_life.

name: MONSTER_UPGRADE_MIN_HALFLIFE
info: Minimal half time for monster upgrade.  If monster upgrade halflife time stat is lower than that value then will be used that value.

name: MONSTER_UPGRADE_MAX_HALFLIFE
info: Maximum half time for monster upgrade.  If monster upgrade halflife time stat is higher than that value then will be used that value.

name: MONSTER_UPGRADE_MIN_DAYS
info: Minimal days for monster upgrade.  Monster upgade time in days can't be lower than that no matter what.  This value doesn't scales with MONSTER_UPGRADE_FACTOR
